parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Activate / deactivate functions ALL ON/ALL OFF
parameter.description: Module responds to commands ALL ON / ALL OFF that may be sent by the main controller or by other controller belonging to the system.

options.option: ALL ON active, ALL OFF active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF is not active
ALL ON is not active ALL OFF active
ALL ON active ALL OFF is not active

parameter.name: config_11_2
parameter.label: 11: Set point set by I2
parameter.description:
65535 – input I2 does not influence on the set point
From 0 to 990 set point from 0.0 °C to 99.0 °C
From 1001 to 1150 – set point from -0.1 °C to -15.0 °C

parameter.name: config_12_2
parameter.label: 12: Set point set by I3
parameter.description:
65535 – input I3 does not influence on the set point
From 0 to 990 set point from 0.0 °C to 99.0 °C
From 1001 to 1150 – set point from -0.1 °C to -15.0 °C

parameter.name: config_30_1
parameter.label: 30: Saving the state of the relay after a power failure
parameter.description: Saving the state of the relay after a power failure

options.option: Module saves its state before power failure (it returns to the last position saved before a power failure)
Module does not save the state after a power failure, it returns to "off" position.

parameter.name: config_40_1
parameter.label: 40: Power reporting in Watts on power change for Q1
parameter.description:
Power report is sent (pushed) only when actual power in Watts in real time changed for more than set percentage comparing to previous actual power in Watts, step is 1%.
  • 0 = Reporting Disabled
  • 1–100 = 1% - 100% Reporting enabled
NOTE: if power changed is less than 1W, the report is not sent (pushed), regardless of percentage set.

parameter.name: config_42_2
parameter.label: 42: Power reporting in Watts by time interval for Q1
parameter.description:
default value is 300 (power report in Watts is sent each 300s)
  • 0 = Reporting Disabled
  • 1–65535 = 1 second – 65535 seconds. Reporting enabled. Power report is sent with time interval set by entered value.

parameter.name: config_43_1
parameter.label: 43: Hysteresis On
parameter.description: This parameter defines temperature min difference between real measured temperature and set-point temperature to turn device on. Parameter can be set from 0 to 255 where 0 to 127 means from 0.0 °C to 12.7 °C and from 128 to 255 means from - 0.1 °C to -12.7 °C.

parameter.name: config_44_1
parameter.label: 44: Hysteresis Off
parameter.description: This parameter defines temperature min difference between real measured temperature and set-point temperature to turn device on. Parameter can be set from 0 to 255 where 0 to 127 means from 0.0 °C to 12.7 °C and from 128 to 255 means from - 0.1 °C to -12.7 °C.

parameter.name: config_45_1
parameter.label: 45: Antifreeze
parameter.description: Set value means at which temperature the device will be turned on even if the thermostat was manually set to off. Parameter can be set from 0 to 255 where 0 to 127 means from 0.0 °C to 12.7 °C and from 128 to 254 means from - 0.1 °C to -12.6 °C. 255 is disabled.

parameter.name: config_60_2
parameter.label: 60: Too low temperature limit
parameter.description: 1 - 1000 = 0.1°C – 100.0°C, step is 0.1°C. Too low temperature limit is set by entered value. In case is set value out of this range, module is changing set value automatically to default value.

parameter.name: config_61_2
parameter.label: 61: Too high temperature limit
parameter.description: 1 - 1000 = 0.1°C – 100.0°C, step is 0.1°C. Too low temperature limit is set by entered value. In case is set value out of this range, module is changing set value automatically to default value.

parameter.name: config_63_2
parameter.label: 63: Switch selection
parameter.description: Set value means the type of the device that is connected to the relay output. The device type can be normally open (NO) or normally close (NC). Available configuration parameters (data type is 1 Byte DEC): • default value 0 • 0 - When system is turned off the output is 0 V. • 1 - When system is turned off the output is 230 V.

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: Basic on/off Q1
parameter.description: Triggered at change of the output Q1 state and reflecting its state

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: Basic on/off I2
parameter.description: Triggered at change of the output I2 state and reflecting its state

parameter.name: group_3
parameter.label: Basic on/off I3
parameter.description: Triggered at change of the output I3 state and reflecting its state

channel-type.label: Switch
channel-type.description: Switch the light on and off
